source.title: Pomaderris

leads.lead_text: Leaves linear, 3–8 mm long, 0.7–1.3 mm wide; margins revolute, entirely obscuring lower lamina
Leaves narrow-ovate to narrow-obovate, 6–15 mm long, 1–6 mm wide; margins recurved to revolute but not entirely obscuring lower lamina
